channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says Venezuelan airspace should be viewed as closed amid largest buildup of U.S. firepower in the region in generations
item.description: The statement also said that U.S. immigration authorities had unilaterally suspended biweekly deportation flights of Venezuelan migrants.

item.title: Supreme Court Must Stop the Left’s Assault on Pro-Life Pregnancy Centers
item.description: The First Amendment rights of pro-life groups and their financial supporters are under attack.

item.title: Washington Gave Bigotry No Sanction. We Should Do the Same
item.description: The measure of American pluralism has never been how well we tolerate those who already think like us.

item.title: Remembering John Simon
item.description: NR’s longtime film critic belonged to a more cultivated, discerning age.

item.title: The $124 trillion Great Wealth Transfer won’t be a ‘big bang’ warns Northwestern Mutual CEO Tim Gerend
item.description: Women live longer than men, and wealth will transfer across spouses before it moves from baby boomers to the next generation.

item.title: Congress races against 3-week deadline to tackle massive year-end legislative agenda
item.description: Lawmakers sprint to finish major legislation, including Obamacare subsidy reforms and appropriations bills, with Jan. 30 funding deadline looming.

item.title: Suspect in National Guard attack had been unraveling for years while alternating between ‘dark isolation and reckless travel’

item.description: Perpetuating false definitions of the earliest stages of life mirrors the dehumanization that enabled Nazi experiments on the 'subhuman.'
